description: Triangle of numbers a(i,j), i+j = n >= 2, giving number of words in a certain language with i 0's, j 1's, ending with 1.
links: S. Dulucq and D. Gouyou-Beauchamps, Sur les facteurs des suites de Sturm, Theoret. Comput. Sci. 71 (1990), 381-400.
formula: Th. 6.2 of the reference gives a generating function.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
